verses.roman:
tomāra milane yabe āmāra haila mana
daive sei kṣaṇe pāiluṅ tomāra daraśana

synonyms: tomāra—of you; milane—in meeting; yabe—when; āmāra—of me; haila—there was; mana—the mind; daive—by chance; sei kṣaṇe—at that very moment; pāiluṅ—got; tomāra—your; daraśana—meeting.
translation: "Just as I was thinking of meeting you, by chance we have actually met.
